NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Mortgages and Demand or the cell corresponding to REITs and Demand?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Mortgages} and {Demand} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Rental and Condition or the cell corresponding to Property Management and Price?

NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Mortgages} and {Age} has a higher heat value.
